title: Heart's Medicine - Doctor Game
description:
Become a doctor in this romantic medical doctor game with Doctor Allison Heart!

GameHouse and Blue Giraffe proudly present the latest GameHouse Original Story doctor game, starring your favorite doctor, Allison Heart!
Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath - Doctor Game is an intense medical drama tied to a casual doctor game that’ll move you to tears. This doctor game has a gripping and unique storyline, original singer/songwriter music, highly detailed artwork and animation, cool addictive doctor gameplay and an insane amount of heart. If you enjoy doctor games that focus on great storytelling, this doctor game is for you!

❤️ Experience the life of a doctor as you rush to find a cure for an unknown disease in a new hospital!
❤️ Your search for a cure will take you through six exciting new hospital wards, from the Doctor's Clinic to the Morgue.
❤️ Play the full doctor game for free, thanks to our free-to-play model.
❤️ More medical levels to play than ever before! Enjoy 240 doctor game levels at launch, with more to come!
❤️ So many extras! Unlock new doctor story scenes, level up your character to earn helpful bonuses in game, and get the hospital upgrades YOU want to buy.
❤️ Party with guinea pig Oliver in a cute hidden object game.
❤️ Master new mini-games like a true doctor, all in medical style.

Follow Doctor Allison in this doctor game as she begins her last rotations as a medical intern at Queensburrow Bridge Hospital, on her path to graduating as a fully-fledged doctor! Unfortunately, things never go smoothly for Doctor Allison, and this is no exception. Doctor Ermey, the lead doctor during her clinic rotation, seems to have it in for her, and threatens to fail her. Doctor Allison ends up watching her chances of becoming a doctor shrink by the minute, desperately searching for a solution, but unable to find one.
However, everything gets put on hold in this doctor game when a patient with a mysterious disease is admitted to the hospital. Several doctors end up becoming infected themselves, including Doctor Connor, Doctor Sophia… and Doctor Ermey. When the CDC quarantines Queensburrow hospital, it’s a race against time for Doctor Allison and the other doctors to find a cure before more deaths occur.
Your assistance in this doctor game will be invaluable to Doctor Allison as she tries to beat the clock and find a cure in time! Experience love, intense action, realistic drama, crazy funny moments and the beauty of celebrating life in Heart’s Medicine – Doctor’s Oath - Doctor Game .

Follow Doctor Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

Follow GameHouse on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

*Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious Emily's cooking games, Doctor Cares pet veterinarian games, Fabulous Angela's fashion games, and Amber's Airline flight attendant games:* https://goo.gl/SXb8sa
